com.pkware.smartcrypt.unstructured

Class UnifiedKmsPasswordListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pkware.smartcrypt.unstructured.UnifiedKmsPasswordListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.pkware.archive.PasswordListener, com.pkware.archive.zip.KMSPasswordListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MetaClientPasswordListener

    public abstract class UnifiedKmsPasswordListener
extends Object
implements com.pkware.archive.zip.KMSPasswordListener
    Simplifies usages of KMSPasswordListener Since the introduction of KMS into the SecureZIP SDK the KMSPasswordListener requires you to overwrite two methods. Typically, PasswordListener.getPassword(com.pkware.archive.Archive, com.pkware.archive.ArchiveEntry, int, int) just forwards.

    This does that for you.
